message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Let me know if you're willing to consider it.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $10000 is a bit lower than what I had in mind, I'm willing to come down a little to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10250. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're willing to consider it.
